name: DATA OVERLOAD
description:
DATA OVERLOAD
Intercept data files before they overload your system.

How To Play:
Move: A/D, ← → or Left Stick on Gamepad
Shoot: Spacebar or A on Gamepad

CREDITS:
Made by Roger || PROJECTaroid
for Ludum Dare 50
Theme: Delay the Inevitable
Made using Godot, Reaper, and Arturia CS-80V
Additional SFX made using drpetter.se/project_sfxr.html
LLPIXEL and Roboto fonts from DaFont.com
